titleStmt.title: Instructions for the more due and regular payment of the quarters of our forces
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall this thirteenth day of June, 1692. In the fourth year of our reign. By Her Majesties Command. Geo. Clarke" -- p. 4
Imperfect: print showthrough, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in Chetham's Library.
